answers.answer: 1. Has your glucose been checked for diabetes? This can cause numbness.2. Have you been checked for vitamin deficiencies? These too can cause numbness.3.. Has your Dr checked you for PERIPHERAL NEUROPATHY? This too can cause numbness.4. Have you undergone an electromyography (EMG) or a nerve conduction study (NCT)?I suggest you ask your family Dr to check for the above and if he or she cannot, then to send you to a neurologist. Such a specialist will quickly diagnose your situation.Best wishes!

question: feeling numbness just above the left knee with itch every now an again
title: numbness
